price: Among the believers there are men who have been true to their pledge to Allah. Some of them have fulfilled their pledge[22], and others are still waiting[23], and they have not changed in the least[24].
arabic: مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رِجَالٞ صَدَقُواْ مَا عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيۡهِۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّن قَضَىٰ نَحۡبَهُۥ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنتَظِرُۖ وَمَا بَدَّلُواْ تَبۡدِيلٗا
footnotes:
[22] i.e., have been martyred or died in the way of Allah.
 [23] i.e., waiting to be martyred for the sake of Allah.
 [24] Unlike the hypocrites who have betrayed their pledges.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: mina al-mu'minīna rijālun ṣadaqū mā ʿāhadū al-laha ʿalayhi famin'hum man qaḍā naḥbahu wamin'hum man yantaẓiru wamā baddalū tabdīlan
